ygData.subject: Re: TWINKING-- a discussion
ygData.msgSnippet: Man.. it s been a long time since I ve read the boards. I wanted to contribute more on this twinking discussion. The most significant thing I want to
ygData.messageBody:
Man.. it's been a long time since I've read the
boards. I wanted to contribute more on this twinking
discussion.<br><br>The most significant thing I want to add is
this:<br><br>Twinking is a double edged sword-- like most things in
life.<br><br>Twinking can be done for good or evil. Well or very badly.
I can't wait till I don't have to worry about not
having enough money for spells, and only 124 wis.
=)<br><br>Course, I've had friends tell me I should just start
making backpacks and sets of cured silks. Just not
enough time to hunt down materials. =)<br>I already know
I will twink my secondary characters at some point.
I don't plan on hurting anyone by doing so or even
giving them anything super rare. But stuff easily
accessible once I get to level 45+ with my druid... etc.
Course-- that's another 15 levels. =)<br><br>shooman
out<br>Fatedhue Prismatic of Drinal
